text: Chung Tin is one of the 41 constituencies in the Sha Tin District in Hong Kong. The constituency returns one district councillor to the Sha Tin District Council, with an election every four years. Previously called Chung Shing, the current Chung Tin constituency is loosely based on Mei Chung Court, Peak One, Granville Garden, Heung Fan Liu New Village and part of Mei Tin Estate, with an estimated population of 15,131. ==Councillors represented== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 2003 | rowspan=2| Tang Wing-cheong | Civil Force |- |style="background-color: " | | 2014 | NPP/CF |- |style="background- color: " | | 2015 | Wong Hok-lai | STCN |} ==Election results== ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ==References== Category:Tai Wai Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sha Tin District Council Category:2003 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 2003
title: Chung Tin (constituency)
